segments.text: I'm looking at the two children in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching up into an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, I see a jar labeled “COOKIE JAR” filled with cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's definitely trying to get some.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It could tip over at any second, I think.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister is standing next to him, reaching out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to be eagerly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are quite focused on their secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, he's got his hand right in the jar now!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup is quite risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall off that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR
